verbose_text: Our previous data show that IFITM3 (1) is important for CM mediated paracrine senescence (XREF_FIG G, XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY B, and S6C), (2) has not been previously found to be a soluble factor (SN) in senescence (XREF_FIG E), and (3) is highly expressed in sEVs derived from cells undergoing OIS and DDIS (XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY A).
